src:
Odložen meč Linglong Super lige Srbije
07 Nov 2019, 13:22 by Milos
Zajednica klubova Super lige Srbije saopštila je da je utakmica 16. kola domaćeg šampionata između Proletera iz Novog Sada i Radničkog odložena. Ovaj susret trebalo je da se odigra u subotu, 9. movembra od 14 sati u Novom Sadu.
Razlog su zdravstveni problemi velikog broja igrača Radničkog. Nišlije je „pokosio“ stomačni virus, a trener Milorad Kosanović ne može da računa na 12 fudbalera.
Klub iz Niša je zatražio odlaganje, Zajednica je tu molbu prihvatila, a termin odigravanja nove utakmice biće naknadno objavljen.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Delayed Linglong Super League match of Serbia
07 Nov 2019, 13:22 by Milos
The Union of Super League clubs announced that the 16th round of the national championship between Proleter from Novi Sad and Radnicki has been postponed. This meeting was supposed to take place on Saturday, the 9th movembra from 2 pm in Novi Sad.
The reason is the health problems of a large number of Radnicki players. Nišlje was "slashed" by a stomach virus, and coach Milorad Kosanovic cannot count on 12 football players.
The Niš club has requested a postponement, the Community has accepted the request, and the date of the new game will be announced later.
